QuestData.Title: Buried Remnants
QuestData.Description:
Much has been lost to the invading forces, those that came with destruction in their hearts.
We cannot preserve this land as the First Ones intended if the Mawsworn are allowed to pulverize all remnants of their knowledge.
See what you can recover from the sands of Provis Strata.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover Strange Artifacts from Provis Strata.
QuestData.RewardText: Without the context in which these were first made, they may remain mysteries. But at least they are not trampled underfoot anymore.
